Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a problem where people need to communicate over a long distance.
The student can illustrate a simple device that uses sound to solve the communication problem.
The student can use provided materials to accurately depict the design of a string telephone.
The student can show in their illustration how information travels through the device using sound.
The student can label the features of the device that allow it to send or receive information over a distance.
The student can demonstrate an understanding of how communicating over distances helps people by including examples in the drawing.
